Package com.rays.common.message

Class MessageServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.rays.common.BaseServiceImpl<MessageDTO,MessageDAOInt>
com.rays.common.message.MessageServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseServiceInt<MessageDTO>, MessageServiceInt
@Service @Transactional public class MessageServiceImpl extends BaseServiceImpl<MessageDTO,MessageDAOInt> implements MessageServiceInt
Session facade of Role Service. It is transactional, apply declarative transactions with help of Spring AOP. If unchecked exception is propagated from a method then transaction is rolled back. Default propagation value is Propagation.REQUIRED and readOnly = false
Author:
SAGAR PATNE
